customers.emptySearch: We could not find any customers that match your search term.

info.connectNowDescription: This retailer is in your customers list but you are not connected on fashiontrade.
info.createProposalDescription: Click this button to create a proposal for this shop.
info.editProposalDescription: There is an existing proposal for this shop. Click here to edit this proposal.

customers.noCustomersBody: Please contact Customer Success to upload your customer data and start trading.
customers.noCustomersTitle: Your customers are not on fashionTrade

brandsPage.basicInfo: Quick view information includes brand name and location.
brandsPage.brandList: Here you will find a complete list of brands on fashionTrade.
brandsPage.brandStory: Want to know more about a brand? Read their full story here.
brandsPage.connect: Interested in this brand? "Invite to connect" will take you through the invitation flow.
brandsPage.connectedBrands: Brands you are already connected with show first.
brandsPage.connectMessage: Share a short message about why you would like to connect with the brand.
brandsPage.contactInfo: You can also see their contact information and address.
brandsPage.finalStep: You have completed the guide! Now you can search, view and connect with brands on fashionTrade.
brandsPage.instagram: Their Instagram feed is directly visible in their profile.
brandsPage.metaData: This section shows the brand's price segment (low, mid, mid/high, high), markup and categories.
brandsPage.pendingRequests: Brands that you have sent a request to show as pending.
brandsPage.profilePage: On a brand profile page you can find more information about the brand and their styles.
brandsPage.requestConnection: Clicking on "Request" will send your invitation.
brandsPage.showroom: This is a brand showroom. You can only view the showroom once a brand has accepted your invitation to connect.
brandsPage.unconnectedBrands: Here is an example of an "unconnected" brand.

educationMode.buyTextbrowse: Browse and buy styles from your connected brands.
educationMode.connect: Browse the digital showrooms of your connected brands.

customersPage.customerBlock: This section contains all the information on related customers and their shops. Related customers are those that match a retailer in fashionTrade.
customersPage.customerName: The customer name is displayed here.
customersPage.finalStep: You have completed the guide. If you have any questions or need any assistance, please contact Customer Success.
customersPage.pageDescription: This page displays a list of your customers. You can search this list and create or edit order proposals for your customers.
customersPage.proposalButton: You can use this button to create/edit an order proposal for this shop.
customersPage.searchBar: Use the searchbar to find specific customers. You can search the list based on the options displayed in the searchbar.
customersPage.shopsInfo: This table displays shop information for your customers. Delivery and invoice locations which are not shops will not be displayed here.
customersPage.showAllIds: Click here to see all customer IDs that match the retailer in fashionTrade.
customersPage.showAllNames: Click here to see all customer names that match the retailer in fashionTrade.

educationMode.findText: Find and invite brands to connect with and then view their styles.

retailerProfile.addNewLocation: Clicking here will add a new location.
retailerProfile.categories: We suggest including the product categories you sell to ensure you receive relevant recommendations.
retailerProfile.editInfo: Clicking here will edit your basic information.
retailerProfile.editInstagram: You can add or edit your Instagram handle here.
retailerProfile.finalStep: You've completed the guide! Now you can create and maintain an amazing profile.
retailerProfile.instagram: You can also add your Instagram feed to your profile.
retailerProfile.invoiceAddress: Check this box if you want this address to be printed on your invoice. Note: you can only select one invoice address.
retailerProfile.locationType: Select the type of location you are adding. A shop address indicates a shopfront and will be visible on your profile. A delivery address is only for stock delivery and won't be visible to brands in your profile.
retailerProfile.logo: Your header image and logo are your identity on the platform, so make sure you upload clear and recent images.
retailerProfile.requiredFields: All fields marked with an "*" are required.
retailerProfile.saveInstagram: Fill in your Instagram handle and click Save.
retailerProfile.saveLocation: Clicking here will save your location. If the button can't be clicked this means a required field is missing.
retailerProfile.saveProfile: Clicking here will save your edits. If the button can't be clicked this means a required field is missing.
retailerProfile.shopAddress: As this is a "shop address", you can add interior and exterior shop images that will show on your profile.
retailerProfile.shopImages: If you added images to your shop, they will show here.
retailerProfile.yourLocations: Here you will find your list of locations (shop and delivery addresses).
retailerProfile.yourProfile: This is the page brands see when they visit your profile. We recommend having a complete profile to maximise your online presence.

stylesPage.addToCart: The plus sign adds the style to your cart. Clicking on the image will expand the style details.
stylesPage.autoSave: Quantities entered will be automatically saved and added to your cart.
stylesPage.cartSaved: Once saved, the pieces will be added to your cart successfully.
stylesPage.cartSaving: This shows that the style is being added to your cart.
stylesPage.cartSummary: A brief overview of your cart is available here. Click "Go to cart" to view a detailed view of your cart.
stylesPage.colorSelector: Click a coloured dot to update the style image to a different colour.
stylesPage.deliveryWindow: Select a delivery window and location (before colours and sizes) to ensure the correct stock availability is shown.
stylesPage.filterResults: Filter to refine your results. Select a filter then click apply to refresh the results.
stylesPage.finalStep: You've completed the guide! Now you can search great styles and buy from your brands.
stylesPage.inlineDetails: Select colours and sizes in the expanded window.
stylesPage.productItem: The style overview includes the style name, brand name, RRP, markup and available colours.
stylesPage.searchBar: Use the search bar to find styles by name or style number.
stylesPage.sizeTable: The size table shows possible combinations of colours and sizes with stock availability.

educationMode.updateProfile: Help brands discover you by maintaining your profile.

locations.alsoIsDeliveryAndShop: This is also a delivery address and a shop. Editing will also update the delivery address and the shop.

shopForm.errorAddingNewShop: An Error occured when adding a new shop. <1></1>Please try again later.

changeOrderStatus.aknowledged: Changing the order status to <1>Acknowledged</1> means that<3></3>you have received the order and will further investigate fulfillment.<5></5>A status update will be sent to the retailer via email.
changeOrderStatus.confirmed: Changing the order status to <1>Confirmed</1> means that you have checked<3></3>your stock levels and the order will be prepared for shipping.<5></5>A status update will be sent to the retailer via email.
changeOrderStatus.rejected2: If you wish to <1>Reject</1> the order please share the reasons why.
changeOrderStatus.rjected1: A status update will be sent to the retailer via email.
changeOrderStatus.shipped: Changing the order status to <1>Shipped</1> means that<3></3>you have fulfilled and shipped the order.<5></5>A status update will be sent to the retailer via email.
